name: IconButton
author: Leon Zhang
description: A button with an anchored icon in addition to a content label

documentation.description: A button with an anchored icon in addition to a content label, allowing users to specify button with icons with having to worry about the exact CSS behind the layout

attributes.src: Defines the image source to use as the button's icon. Only does something if the icon is a element (which is the default behavior)
attributes.icon-anchor: Defines the location of the icon relative to the content label. Valid options are 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom'

getters.src: Returns the image source used as the button's icon.
getters.iconAnchor: Returns the location of the icon relative to the content label. Valid options are 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom'
getters.iconEl: Returns the DOM element representing the button's icon
getters.contentEl: Returns the DOM element representing the button's content label

setters.src: Sets the image source used as the button's icon.
setters.iconAnchor: Sets the location of the icon relative to the content label. Valid options are 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom'
